item_info.advanced_solars.helmet_product: Produces %s EU/t while the sky is visible;
item_info.advanced_solars.helmet_lower_p: Otherwise produces %s EU/t while the moon is visible or during rain
wiki.advanced_solars.category: Advanced Solars Classic Items and Blocks
wiki.advanced_solars.header.main: Advanced Solars classic blocks and items
wiki.advanced_solars.preview.main.desc: Advanced solars adds a few solar panels and solar helmets that you may find useful. Here you can find info on what they do.
wiki.advanced_solars.preview.advanced_so: Advanced solar helmets are upgrades to nano/quantum helmets with an integrated solar panel. Note: they do not have a charger slot.
Advanced Solar panels are panels with batter rates then their compacted counterparts, and also can output a lowered amount at night.
wiki.advanced_solars.preview.molecular_t: The molecular transformer is a block that simply transforms some items into others using energy, speed increases with higher input rates.
